TopicTitle: Etherium: A Kerbal Space Program Story (Chapter 43: The Final Push, part two)

Articles.Content: Hey guys!  Just wanted to give you a reason for my absence lately....Real Life.  Lately I don't seem to get as much time anymore to do what I want to do, hell...even my remake of a KSP machinisma I want to do is sorta rotting in a dark corner somewhere...Still build stuff though because I seem to be able to throw things together in KSP and have it fly right off though.  and for the record I did want to finish Etherium...Stupid RL,  lol
